title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses David Feherty's move to LIV Golf. Is Charles Barkley next? Devon Allen discusses getting DQ'd from the 110 meter hurdle at the Track World Championship for a false start. And Kevin Millar calls in from MLB All Star week to recap last night's derby and preview tonight's game. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses David Feherty's move to LIV Golf. Is Charles Barkley next? Devon Allen discusses getting DQ'd from the 110 meter hurdle at the Track World Championship for a false start. And Kevin Millar calls in from MLB All Star week to recap last night's derby and preview tonight's game. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
